headline: Rockwell Automation (ROK) Valuation Check After Earnings Beat And Upgraded Profit Outlook
summary: Rockwell Automation (ROK) is back in focus after reporting fiscal first quarter results that topped earnings and revenue expectations, along with a higher full year profit outlook and continued share repurchases. See our latest analysis for Rockwell Automation. The earnings beat and higher profit outlook arrived as Rockwell Automation’s share price reached US$415.02, with a 90 day share price return of 11.12% and a 1 year total shareholder return of 57.15%, suggesting momentum has been...
